doc.summary: Gets the <ref cls="net/minecraft/resources/ResourceLocation">ResourceLocation</ref> as a <ref cls="net/minecraft/network/chat/MutableComponent">mutable component</ref> with a click action that copies it into the clipboard.
doc.text: Gets the <ref cls="net/minecraft/resources/ResourceLocation">ResourceLocation</ref> as a <ref cls="net/minecraft/network/chat/MutableComponent">mutable component</ref> with a click action that copies it into the clipboard.

properties.text: use a <ref cls="net/minecraft/network/chat/TextComponent">TextComponent</ref>. For the copy to clipboard on click, use <ref cls="io/github/noeppi_noeppi/libx/util/ComponentUtil" method="withCopyAction" type="(net.minecraft.network.chat.Component,java.lang.String)net.minecraft.network.chat.Component">ComponentUtil#withCopyAction(Component, String)</ref>
